verses.verse: כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When יְבִֽיאֲךָ֙ <S%H935><s%> shall bring יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you בָא־ <S%H935><s%> whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <S%H3423><s%> to possess וְנָשַׁ֣ל <S%H5394><s%> it and hath cast out גּֽוֹיִם־ <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֣ים ׀ <S%H7227><s%> many מִפָּנֶ֡יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before הַֽחִתִּי֩ <S%H2850><s%> thee the Hittites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֨י <S%H1622><s%> and the Girgashites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֜י <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites וְהַכְּנַעֲנִ֣י <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֗י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <S%H2340><s%> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֔י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> seven גוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> greater וַעֲצוּמִ֖ים <S%H6099><s%> and mightier מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

וּנְתָנָ֞ם <S%H5414><s%> shall deliver יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> And when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> them before וְהִכִּיתָ֑ם <S%H5221><s%> thee thou shalt smite הַחֲרֵ֤ם <S%H2763><s%> them [and] utterly תַּחֲרִים֙ <S%H2763><s%> destroy אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תִכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> them thou shalt make לָהֶ֛ם בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> no covenant וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no תְחָנֵּֽם׃ <S%H2603><s%> with them nor shew mercy

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִתְחַתֵּ֖ן <S%H2859><s%> Neither shalt thou make marriages בָּ֑ם בִּתְּךָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> with them thy daughter לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> thou shalt not give לִבְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> unto his son וּבִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> nor his daughter לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> shalt thou take לִבְנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1121><s%> unto thy son

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָסִ֤יר <S%H5493><s%> For they will turn away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> thy son מֵֽאַחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> from following וְעָבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> me that they may serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> other וְחָרָ֤ה <S%H2734><s%> be kindled אַף־ <S%H639><s%> so will the anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּכֶ֔ם וְהִשְׁמִידְךָ֖ <S%H8045><s%> against you and destroy מַהֵֽר׃ <S%H4118><s%> thee suddenly

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus תַעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> But thus shall ye deal לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like מִזְבְּחֹתֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4196><s%> their altars תִּתֹּ֔צוּ <S%H5422><s%> with them ye shall destroy וּמַצֵּבֹתָ֖ם <S%H4676><s%> their images תְּשַׁבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H7665><s%> and break down וַאֲשֵֽׁירֵהֶם֙ <S%H842><s%> their groves תְּגַדֵּע֔וּן <S%H1438><s%> and cut down וּפְסִילֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6456><s%> their graven images תִּשְׂרְפ֥וּן <S%H8313><s%> and burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> For thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> you לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּךָ֞ בָּחַ֣ר ׀ <S%H977><s%> hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <S%H5459><s%> thee to be a special מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> unto himself above all people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [are] upon the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the earth ס

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor מֵֽרֻבְּכֶ֞ם <S%H7230><s%> you because ye were more מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> in number than any people חָשַׁ֧ק <S%H2836><s%> did not set his love יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בָּכֶ֖ם וַיִּבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> upon you nor choose בָּכֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you הַמְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> for ye [were] the fewest מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> of all people

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> because מֵֽאַהֲבַ֨ת <S%H160><s%> loved יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> But because the LORD אֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> וּמִשָּׁמְר֤וֹ <S%H8104><s%> you and because he would keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁבֻעָה֙ <S%H7621><s%> the oath אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּע֙ <S%H7650><s%> which he had sworn לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> unto your fathers הוֹצִ֧יא <S%H3318><s%> brought you out יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> hath the LORD אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָ֑ה <S%H2389><s%> with a mighty וַֽיִּפְדְּךָ֙ <S%H6299><s%> and redeemed מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> you out of the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> of bondmen מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> from the hand פַּרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ <S%H3045><s%> Know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> therefore that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> he [is] God הָאֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> God הַֽנֶּאֱמָ֔ן <S%H539><s%> the faithful שֹׁמֵ֧ר <S%H8104><s%> which keepeth הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant וְהַחֶ֗סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and mercy לְאֹהֲבָ֛יו <S%H157><s%> with them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> him and keep [מִצְוֹתֹו כ] (מִצְוֹתָ֖יו <S%H4687><s%> commanded ק) לְאֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> to a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

וּמְשַׁלֵּ֧ם <S%H7999><s%> And repayeth לְשֹׂנְאָ֛יו <S%H8130><s%> them that hate אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> him to their face לְהַאֲבִיד֑וֹ <S%H6><s%> to destroy לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> He will not יְאַחֵר֙ <S%H309><s%> them he will not be slack לְשֹׂ֣נְא֔וֹ <S%H8130><s%> to him that hateth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> him to his face יְשַׁלֶּם־ <S%H7999><s%> him he will repay לֽוֹ׃

וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H8104><s%> Thou shalt therefore keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְוָ֜ה <S%H4687><s%> the commandments וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <S%H2706><s%> and the statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <S%H4941><s%> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> to do פ

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> shall come עֵ֣קֶב <S%H6118><s%> Wherefore it shall come to pass if תִּשְׁמְע֗וּן <S%H8085><s%> ye hearken אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֙ <S%H4941><s%> to these judgments הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> to these וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H8104><s%> and keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְשָׁמַר֩ <S%H8104><s%> shall keep יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> them that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְךָ֗ אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> unto thee the covenant וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and the mercy אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers

וַאֲהֵ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H157><s%> And he will love וּבֵרַכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> thee and bless וְהִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7235><s%> thee and multiply וּבֵרַ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> thee he will also bless פְּרִֽי־ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit בִטְנְךָ֣ <S%H990><s%> of thy womb וּפְרִֽי־ <S%H6529><s%> and the fruit אַ֠דְמָתֶךָ <S%H127><s%> of thy land דְּגָ֨נְךָ֜ <S%H1715><s%> thy corn וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <S%H8492><s%> and thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֗ךָ <S%H3323><s%> and thine oil שְׁגַר־ <S%H7698><s%> the increase אֲלָפֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H504><s%> of thy kine וְעַשְׁתְּרֹ֣ת <S%H6251><s%> and the flocks צֹאנֶ֔ךָ <S%H6629><s%> of thy sheep עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> in הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers לָ֥תֶת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָֽךְ׃

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Thou shalt be blessed תִּֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> above all people לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְךָ֛ עָקָ֥ר <S%H6135><s%> there shall not be male וַֽעֲקָרָ֖ה <S%H6135><s%> or female barren וּבִבְהֶמְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H929><s%> among you or among your cattle

וְהֵסִ֧יר <S%H5493><s%> will take away יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> at כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֹ֑לִי <S%H2483><s%> from thee all sickness וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מַדְוֵי֩ <S%H4064><s%> diseases מִצְרַ֨יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הָרָעִ֜ים <S%H7451><s%> none of the evil אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> which thou knowest לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> and He will not יְשִׂימָם֙ <S%H7760><s%> and will put בָּ֔ךְ וּנְתָנָ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> upon thee but will lay בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שֹׂנְאֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8130><s%> them upon all [them] that hate

וְאָכַלְתָּ֣ <S%H398><s%> And thou shalt consume אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> all the people אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> shall deliver לָ֔ךְ לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תָחֹ֥ס <S%H2347><s%> shall have no pity עֵֽינְךָ֖ <S%H5869><s%> thee thine eye עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעֲבֹד֙ <S%H5647><s%> upon them neither shalt thou serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their gods כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that מוֹקֵ֥שׁ <S%H4170><s%> for that [will be] a snare ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָֽךְ׃ ס

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> If תֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> If thou shalt say בִּלְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart רַבִּ֛ים <S%H7227><s%> [are] more הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> These nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> than אֵיכָ֥ה <S%H349><s%> than I how אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> can לְהוֹרִישָֽׁם׃ <S%H3423><s%> I dispossess

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> Thou shalt not be afraid מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> you זָכֹ֣ר <S%H2142><s%> of them [but] shalt well תִּזְכֹּ֗ר <S%H2142><s%> remember אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> what the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְפַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> and unto all Egypt

הַמַּסֹּ֨ת <S%H4531><s%> temptations הַגְּדֹלֹ֜ת <S%H1419><s%> The great אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw עֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> which thine eyes וְהָאֹתֹ֤ת <S%H226><s%> and the signs וְהַמֹּֽפְתִים֙ <S%H4159><s%> and the wonders וְהַיָּ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> hand הַחֲזָקָה֙ <S%H2389><s%> and the mighty וְהַזְּרֹ֣עַ <S%H2220><s%> arm הַנְּטוּיָ֔ה <S%H5186><s%> and the stretched out אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הוֹצִֽאֲךָ֖ <S%H3318><s%> brought thee out יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> whereby the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כֵּֽן־ <S%H3651><s%> So יַעֲשֶׂ֞ה <S%H6213><s%> do יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> so shall the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of whom אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you יָרֵ֖א <S%H3373><s%> afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> accept
